nodes.text: Chiss uniforms were a type of clothing used by the Chiss Defense Force, notably including the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet. One version of the uniform was capable of absorbing energy and had armor plating, protecting the wearer from blaster fire.

Chiss uniforms had shoulder patches bearing the insignia of their owner's Chiss family, as well as silver bars on their collar indicating the owner's military rank. In the case of cadets, the bars were absent as they had no official rank yet, although the family shoulder patch was still present.

Chiss uniforms were colored black for cadets and officers below flag rank, which began at the rank of Commodore. Upon promotion to flag officer, a Chiss officer was stripped of their family ties, with the Supreme Admiral declaring "The Ascendancy is your family." At that point, flag officers received new white uniforms whose shoulder patch insignia was now the insignia of the Chiss Ascendancy. As with those below flag rank, flag officers' white uniforms bore silver bars indicating their military rank.
In the case of Eli Vanto, a rare human alien in the service of the Chiss Ascendancy, his black uniform also bore the family shoulder patch of the Ascendancy.

During his investigations on Batuu, Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo wore a black uniform with a burgundy patch on one shoulder and silver bars on the collar. The burgundy shoulder patch bore the sunrise insignia of Thrawn's Mitth family, and the silver collar bars denoted the rank of Senior Captain.
